title: LF people who also want to power level thier accounts to 30
body: Okay so im looking for people who want to power level to 30, and the fastest way iv found out to do this is to get 3 people in a custome game against 3 bots on TTL map, putting 3 bots against 3 humans will make it a Bots vs AI gamemode, and the beauty of playing on TTL is that u can end a game in 5min and still get normal xp for it (anything before 5mins will result in no ip/xp) combo this with xpboost and u get 300 xp per game, well 287xp to be exact. So if anyone is keen on leveling fast add: Sir Teapot

replies.body:
I'll add you on my smurf which I am grinding to level 30. It's called 'ArcaneFate' (look I know it's cringe but I made this account when I was like twelve).

I might be on sometime tomorrow, if not then I'll most definitely be on on the weekend.

Do you get IP from this method?
isn't this been changed many years ago. I'm pretty sure u can't do it like this anymore
nop still works, been doing for a while now
